name: cfa-template
description: The base template for Create Frigg App.

scripts.start: concurrently "cd template/backend && npm run backend-start" "cd template/frontend && npm run frontend-start"
scripts.test-backend: echo backend; pwd; cd template/backend && npm test
scripts.test-frontend: echo frontend; pwd; cd template/frontend && npm test
scripts.test: npm run test-backend && npm run test-frontend
